title: Pogonophobia and You
body:
Every year, millions of ADCs suffer from pogonophobia. Whether it be from an Olaf or Gragas, do your part to help pogonophobes in North America by sporting the MSI icon, in store for 1IP. And equip it too, even if you are a 1-trick Udyr.

http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/articles/msi-2017-fandom-battle
